Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

First of all, I'm new to this forum so if I haven't put this thread in the right section of the forum please forgive me.

Secondly, to save you time from reading, I will jump straight to the topic. I want to be an astronaut. Yes that's right. I love space and I want to be an astronaut some day, like Chris Hadfield perhaps. I want to solve all the mysteries of the universe. But since I'm not from America, it saddens me to know that the chance of me becoming an astronaut is close to 0.

However, as soon as I heard Axe Apollo has given an opportunity for astronaut wannabe's to be in space, I couldn't help but sign up immediately. So to win the competition, I need your votes . So if you vote for me, it would mean a lot to me. Or if you don't vote but have read what I have written so far, to know this is very important to me, that's just lovely too . Thank you, thank you so much.

So here is the link. You can vote in just 5 seconds by clicking the blue button above my name and enter your email. If you have any questions please comment.

https://www.lynxapollo.com/vi_VN/38761/thanh-long-vu/

To those who want to enter the contest, please feel free to sign up. Everyone has the right to become an astronaut. I will vote for you and you can choose to return the favour too. I might see you in space who knows?

So that's all I have to say. Thank you everyone. Thanks for your time. I really appreciate it. May I wish your day is filled with rainbows and happiness
